name: Damageable
description: Base class for all Damageable entities. It provides Health and Damage related methods and events.

functions.name: ApplyDamage
functions.description_long: Do damage to this entity, will trigger all related events and apply modified damage based on bone. Also will apply impulse if it's a heavy explosion

parameters.name: instigator
parameters.description: The player which caused the damage

parameters.name: causer
parameters.description: The object which caused the damage

functions.name: IsDead
functions.description: Returns if the entity is dead

functions.name: Respawn
functions.description: Respawns the Entity, fullying it's Health and moving it to it's Initial Location

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: If not passed will use the initial location passed when the Entity spawned

functions.name: SetHealth
functions.description: Sets the Health of this Entity
functions.description_long: Sets the Health of this Entity. You can only call it on alive Entities (call Respawn first)

functions.name: SetMaxHealth
functions.description: Sets the MaxHealth of this Entity

events.name: HealthChange
events.description: When Entity has it's Health changed, or because took damage or manually set through scripting or respawning

arguments.name: causer
arguments.description: The object which caused the damage

events.name: TakeDamage
events.description: Triggered when this Entity takes damage

arguments.name: from_direction
arguments.description: Direction of the damage relative to the damaged actor

arguments.name: instigator
arguments.description: The player which caused the damage

arguments.name: causer
arguments.description: The object which caused the damage

return.description: Return false to cancel the damage (will still display animations, particles and apply impact forces)
